desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour

Class Yard

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
        • desmoj.core.simulator.Reportable
          • desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour.Block
            • desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour.Yard

  • public class Yard
extends Block
    Yard is the place where containers (or other kind of goods) can be stored by transpoters or cranes and retrieved by transporters or cranes. The yard consists of blocks. The storing in the Yard is possible using store(Block b) .With the retrieve(Block b) a container can be retrieved from the Yard. Yard is part of the composite design pattern as described in [Gamm97] page 163. Yard is derived from Block, which provides the functionality of the Block.
    See Also:
    Block

    • Constructor Detail

      • Yard

        public Yard(Model owner,
            java.lang.String name,
            ChooseBlockYardStrategy s,
            boolean showInReport,
            boolean showInTrace)
        Constructor for a Yard.
        Parameters:
        owner - desmoj.Model : The model this Yard is associated to.
        name - java.lang.String : The Yard's name.
        typ - int : The Block's type. It can be only 0 - for export containers, 1- for import containers or 2 - mixed: for import and export containers.
        capacity - long : The maximum capacity (TEU) of this Block.
        showInReport - boolean : Flag, if this Block should produce a report or not.
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for trace to produce trace messages.

        Parameters:

      • storeInOverflow

        public void storeInOverflow(long n)
        Method for producers to make the Yard store a number of n TEUs (a container) in its overflow part.
        Parameters:
        n - long : The weight of the container to be stored in the overflow part of this yard. n must be positive.

      • retrieveFromOverflow

        public boolean retrieveFromOverflow(long n)
        Method for consumers to retrieve from the overflow part of this Yard a number of n TEUs (a container).
        Parameters:
        n - long : The weight of the container to be stored in the overflow part of this yard. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if the try was successfull, false otherwise.

      • store

        public boolean store(Block b,
                     long n)
        Method for producers to make the Yard store a number of n TEUs (a container). When the capacity of the yard can not hold the additional incoming TEUs the try to store will be refused.
        Parameters:
        b - Block : The block of the yard to store.
        n - long : The weight of the container to be stored in this Yard. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if the container can been stored successfully, false otherwise.

      • retrieve

        public boolean retrieve(Block b,
                        long n)
        Method for consumers to make the Yard retrieve a number of n TEUs (a container). When the yard is empty the try to retrieve will be refused.
        Parameters:
        b - Block : The block of the yard to retrieve.
        n - long : The weight of the container to be stored in this Yard. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if the container can been stored successfully, false otherwise.

      • getOverflow

        public long getOverflow()
        Gets the current number of TEUs/containers in the overflow part of this yard.
        Returns:
        long : The current capacity of te overflow part of the yard.

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree(long n)
        Method to check if the Yard is free (there's at least one block that is free).
        Overrides:
        isFree in class Block
        Parameters:
        n - long : The number of TEUs that are at least must be avalaible (free) in the Yard.
        Returns:

      • reserve

        public boolean reserve(Block b,
                       long n)
        Method for producers to make the Yard reserve a number of n TEUs (a place for a container) to be stored there later. When the whole available capacity is already reserved the try to reserve will be refused.
        Parameters:
        b - Block : The block of the yard to reserve.
        n - long : The number of TEUs that are needed for a container to be stored in the Yard. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if a place for a container can been reserved successfully, false otherwise.

      • plan

        public boolean plan(Block b,
                    long n)
        Method for consumers to make the Yard plan a number of n TEUs (a place for a container) to be retrieved there later. When all the containers are already planed for the later retrieving the try to plan will be refused.
        Parameters:
        b - Block : The block of the yard to plan.
        n - long : The number of TEUs that a container that is in the Yard weights. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if a container can been planed successfully, false otherwise.
